description: LINSTOR and DRBD dashboard ready to use with piraeus-operator.

panels.description: DRBD data out of sync with a peer

targets.expr: sum(max by(name, volume) (drbd_peerdevice_outofsync_bytes{pod=~"$node"} > 0)) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: out-of-sync data

targets.expr: count(count by (name) (drbd_connection_state{drbd_connection_state!="UpToDate", drbd_connection_state!="Connected", pod=~"$node"} == 1)) OR on() vector(0)

panels.description: DRBD data out of sync with a peer
panels.title: out-of-sync

title: LINSTOR / DRBD
